arguments.template:
♦ ?
Link types: Dotted line: Destination of a Node Line: Source of a Node Node types: circle - {{typeMapping['circle']}} square - {{typeMapping['square']}} triangle-up - {{typeMapping['triangle-up']}} diamond - {{typeMapping['diamond']}} cross - {{typeMapping['cross']}} triangle-down - {{typeMapping['triangle-down']}}
Hover to highlight 1st-order neighborhood. Click to fade surroundings. Double-click to center node and zoom in. Hold SHIFT and Double-click to zoom out. Filter nodes by: SHIFT + "C" : Show/hide all circle {{typeMapping['circle'] ? "(" + typeMapping['circle'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "S" : Show/hide all square {{typeMapping['square'] ? "(" + typeMapping['square'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "T" : Show/hide all triangle-up {{typeMapping['triangle-up'] ? "(" + typeMapping['triangle-up'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "R" : Show/hide all diamond {{typeMapping['diamond'] ? "(" + typeMapping['diamond'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "X" : Show/hide all cross {{typeMapping['cross'] ? "(" + typeMapping['cross'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "D" : Show/hide all triangle-down {{typeMapping['triangle-down'] ? "(" + typeMapping['triangle-down'] + ")" : ""}} nodes SHIFT + "L" : Show/hide all low range group (%33) nodes SHIFT + "M" : Show/hide all medium range group (%50) nodes SHIFT + "H" : Show/hide all high range group (%66) nodes SHIFT + "1" : Show/hide all low range group (%33) links SHIFT + "2" : Show/hide all medium range group (%50) links SHIFT + "3" : Show/hide all high range group (%66) links
